commit.message:
c-pretty-print.c (pp_c_cv_qualifiers): Remove code dealing with whitespaces before qualifier names.

	* c-pretty-print.c (pp_c_cv_qualifiers): Remove code dealing
	with whitespaces before qualifier names.
